summary: This bill, the Department of War Restoration Act of 2025 (H.R. 5080), proposes to rename the Department of Defense to the Department of War. It also renames the Secretary of Defense to the Secretary of War and mandates that all existing legal references to the Department of Defense and the Secretary of Defense are now considered references to the Department of War and its secretary. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on September 2, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
